properties.entry: Files with the same name still exists in the export folder!
ZFEx can overwrite existing files or skip them. As an alternative you can break off copying the png files.
select the place of the export folder
With ZFEx it is possible to automate some export jobs from ZF laser radar projects, which are normally done with different functions of the full version of ZF LaserControl.
At first these are copying the 360Â° panoramic views from the scan points and the corresponding coordinate file.
For processing this two steps it is necessary to choose first the ZF laser radar project file (*.zfprj) and second an export folder.
Additionally it is possible to write to coordinate of the standpoints into a JSON file. This file can be used for example in a HTML viewer.
select laser radar project file to export from
start export from ZF laser radar project
PNG folder already exists in the export folder %s.

Export of %s panoramic images to the folder %s successful.

Write stand points successful to the file %s.
ZFEx - Simple export from ZF laser radar projects
